text: @realDonaldTrump 11kLikes dont care about Trump encouraging mass deaths by pushing non compliance to prevention effort against Coronavirus. Pray that your Burger is not infected. Trump doesnt give a hoot about making Factories accountable to giving us safe foods and their workers to be safer.
